page.title: 07Arts and Crafts
page.content: In{Kilbarchan}there are many{ artists {and craftsmen.}Some of Kilbarchan's better known crafts are{painting, {sculpting,soft toy making,jewellery {and weaving.} Kilbarchan has many professional artists.The most famous of these is{Mary Armour}who is well known for her glowing still lifes. {William Armour,}now deceased, was famous for his delightful portraits of local children.Talented amateur artists come to Kilbarchan to paint the{Weavers Cottage,Steeple Hall}or other picturesque scenes from village life.Several annual exhibitions are mounted in the village to display the work of professional,and amateur artists.Children are encouraged to show their drawing abilities at an annual show of their work held in the local primary school by the{Parents {Association.}
